title: Breaking up my T206 set: AB, Cycle, Old Mill, Tolstoi, EPDG
author: BBT206

posts.post_title: Breaking up my T206 set: AB, Cycle, Old Mill, Tolstoi, EPDG
posts.post_content:
I am breaking up my T206 set! It contains a variety of backs. If you are interested in receiving my spreadsheet, email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url]. Send me a list, I will send scans and prices.  Below are prices for a few pictured cards in this post.  Thanks, Bill

Cole SGC 70 Old Mill $1100
Chappelle SGC 80 Cycle 350 $900
Wilhelm Batting SGC 60 American Beauty 350 No Frame $1500
Stahl Glove show SGC 50 Tolstoi $500
Lake Ball in hand SGC 55 Cycle 460 $1100
Stone SGC 60 Sovereign 150 $600
Adkins SGC 40 Polar Bear $500
Murray Portrait SGC 70 EPDG $800
Meyers Portrait SGC 60 EPDG $600
McQuillan with bat SGC 45 American Beauty 350 No Frame $550
Walsh SGC 40 PD 350 $800

Thanks for all the responses to my post.  Bear with me, I will answer your emails as quickly as I can.  Thanks again, Bill

Bill, I'm interested in so much but will start with these...  Lundgren (Chicago), Demmitt (St. Louis), and O'Hara (St. Louis).  Please provide scans and prices.  Thanks.

MB

Bill, any AB 350 no frames?


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Thanks for all the responses to my post.  Lots of great T206 still available.  Bill

Bill,

As discussed, I'll take the O'Hara St. Louis SGC 1.5. Sold!

Thanks!

Mike
Send me a wantlist and I will send scans and prices.  Thanks, Bill
How about some prices on the cards posted?

Bill is breaking up the whole set. He just posted some pics of some for sale.
